name: Purple Jack
description: If you enjoy the sativa-dominant Jack Herer but are looking for more low-key, relaxed effects, Purple Jack is for you. This fruity, spicy hybrid combines Jack Herer with Purple Kush for a buzz that walks somewhere between mental energy and a full-body calm. Over time, the cerebral invigoration may fade to a lethargy conducive for sleep and rest. Enveloped by dark purple leaves, Purple Jackâ€™s buds are typically a dark green color with a heavy sugaring of kief.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Relaxed, Uplifted, Focused, Creative, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Headaches, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache
